DOC.detailed_description: A series scientific study evaluate tryptase biomarker coronary plaque instability , course ischemic heart disease . Among , recent 'outcome ' well define Meixiang Xiang study , conduct 2011 270 patient . This study evaluate compare level tryptase four population : 1. acute myocardial infarction ( 31 subject ) 2. unstable angina ( 108 subject ) 3. stable angina ( 36 subject ) 4. coronary artery disease coronary stenosis < 50 % ( 95 subject ) . In Chinese population final evaluation lead define tryptase marker independent instability atheromatous plaque . In reference fact still correlation tryptase coronary plaque instability clinical symptom , propose verification study role tryptase biomarker acute coronary condition study large population Italian subject acute phase pathology follow . The work conduct 4 patient population : 1. acute coronary syndrome ST elevation electrocardiogram ; 2. acute coronary syndrome without ST elevation electrocardiogram ( acute myocardial infarction ST-segment depression electrocardiogram unstable angina ) 3. noncritical coronary artery disease coronary stenosis < 50 % ; 4. aortic aneurysm . Secondary endpoint evaluate role tryptase event major cardiovascular event .
